content.text:
Just added a base16 builder, so now you can pick from [any base16 theme](http://chriskempson.com/projects/base16/) and add the code from [here](https://gitlab.com/christianbundy/base16-patchbay/tree/master/templates/patchbay/colors) to your /settings to make it work *automagically*.

The solarized colorscheme [currently] works best, but many others seem to work fine too. Here's phd:


![base16-phd-patchbay.png](&RWSE5orOHHMV1t2xBXevYbua+cRth6F5+rlHQJLfYMA=.sha256)
